name: The Warrior of Frozenbottom Caves
description:
Fearless Adventurer...

Tales of the ancient Warrior and his hoard of treasure await those who brave the trifles and terrors of the Frozenbottom Caves. Fight your way through the dark and dreary Spirit Woods, descend the depths of the caves and confront the Warrior himself!

Please help us out by giving us your feedback on the game! Follow this link to answer some statements about our game!

https://forms.gle/q5ofW75KJ81KL2Vk6

Patch #2: The version number format has been fixed, the latest version is now _v0_1_2. This patch contains more bug fixes and tweaks, so please update if you haven't already!

HOTFIX: Please make sure your zip folder has the _v1.01 appendix!

4 - Thrust
